video:video.video:title: Groove #KnowYou
video:video.video:description: Most women grow up thinking that their bodies are mysterious and unpredictable. But what if we told you that it doesn't have to be that way? Groove is on a mission to help build confidence, raise self-esteem, and reduce the prevalence of body image issues by providing education and tools to help women get to know how their bodies work. Your body helps you do so many things. Your body is amazing. We want to help you get to know it better. So tell us, how well do YOU #KnowYou? Download the app: https://itunes.apple.com/app/id831795151 Twitter: http://twitter.com/readytogroove Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/readytogroove Learn about Groove: http://readytogroove.com

video:video.video:title: Meet Groove
video:video.video:description: Groove is the period tracker you've been waiting for. This stunning app automatically customizes and adapts based on YOUR unique data. Learn about YOUR body and achieve YOUR goals with the help of Groove. It gets more accurate over time and uses advanced algorithms to predict your next period. Take control of YOUR body and YOUR cycles with Groove! Download the app: https://itunes.apple.com/app/id831795151 Twitter: http://twitter.com/readytogroove Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/readytogroove Learn about Groove: http://readytogroove.com
